subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Series
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Bill Mott is taking his time preparing the colt To Honor and Serve, winner of three races in five starts, for a possible spot at the Kentucky Derby.
snippet: Bill Mott is taking his time preparing the colt To Honor and Serve, winner of three races in five starts, for a possible spot at the Kentucky Derby.
